Package com.medilabosolutions.frontend_service.controller

Class PatientController

java.lang.Object
com.medilabosolutions.frontend_service.controller.PatientController
@Controller @RequestMapping public class PatientController extends Object
Controller handling patient-related operations including CRUD operations and note management.

    • getPatientReportAndNotes

      @GetMapping("/patient/{id}") public String getPatientReportAndNotes(@PathVariable int id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Retrieves and displays a patient's report and notes.
      Parameters:
      id - the patient ID
      model - the Spring Model object to add attributes for the view
      Returns:
      the view name "patient-report-and-notes" to render

    • showCreatePatientForm

      Displays the form for creating a new patient.

      model - the Spring Model object to add attributes for the view
      Returns:
      the view name "patient-form" to render

    • createPatient

      @PostMapping("/patients/create") public String createPatient(@Valid @Valid PatientCreateDTO patientCreateDTO, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult, org.springframework.ui.Model model, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
      Creates a new patient.
      Parameters:
      patientCreateDTO - the patient data to create
      bindingResult - the binding result for validation errors
      model - the Spring Model object to add attributes for the view
      redirectAttributes - attributes for redirect scenarios
      Returns:
      redirect to the newly created patient's page on success, or back to form on failure

    • addNote

      @PostMapping("/patient/{id}/add-note") public String addNote(@PathVariable int id, @Valid @Valid NoteCreateDTO noteCreateDTO)
      Adds a new note for a patient.
      Parameters:
      id - the patient ID
      noteCreateDTO - the note data to create
      Returns:
      redirect to the patient's page

    • deleteNote

      @PostMapping("/patient/{patientId}/delete-note/{noteId}") public String deleteNote(@PathVariable int patientId, @PathVariable String noteId)
      Deletes a patient's note.
      Parameters:
      patientId - the patient ID
      noteId - the note ID to delete
      Returns:
      redirect to the patient's page

    • updatePatient

      @PostMapping("/patient/{id}/update") public String updatePatient(@PathVariable int id, @Valid @Valid PatientUpdateDTO patientUpdateDTO, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult, org.springframework.ui.Model model, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
      Updates a patient's information.
      Parameters:
      id - the patient ID
      patientUpdateDTO - the updated patient data
      bindingResult - the binding result for validation errors
      model - the Spring Model object to add attributes for the view
      redirectAttributes - attributes for redirect scenarios
      Returns:
      redirect to the patient's page on success, or back to form on failure

      Returns:
